entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is mentioned as a location where someone was able to slip Katie something.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is mentioned as the person who received something from someone in Hogsmeade.

entities.name: rosmerta
entities.description: Rosmerta is mentioned as a person under the Imperius Curse, forced to lurk in her bathroom and pass a necklace to students.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as taunting Dumbledore about finally understanding Rosmerta's situation.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as questioning Malfoy about his communication with Rosmerta.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is mentioned as receiving a poisoned mead from Rosmerta, believing it to be Dumbledore's Christmas present.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned as not checking a bottle of Rosmerta's due to his position.

relationships.description: Malfoy and Dumbledore are communicating about Rosmerta's situation, with Malfoy taunting Dumbledore about finally understanding.
Rosmerta poisoned the mead and sent it to Slughorn, believing it to be Dumbledore's Christmas present.
Rosmerta was able to influence Filch not to check a bottle of hers due to his position.
